name: HH_EPSD_ANC_PROV
description: This table contains Home Health episode-level ancillary providers information. This information is entered in the Episode Info 2 form as part of an Intake encounter in the Ancillary Providers table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the Ancillary provider ID. Links to the provider (SER) master file. Links to table CLARITY_SER.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_CMT
columns.description: Ancillary provider comment text entered by a user.

columns.name: RECV_PLAN_OF_CARE_FYI_YN
columns.description: Flag for determining whether a provider should be included on FYI messages when new supplemental orders are added to the plan of care.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_UNQ_ADR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique ID of the address that should be used for this provider in the ancillary provider table.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: The ancillary provider's relation to the patient.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_START_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the ancillary provider began care of the patient.

columns.name: ANC_PROV_END_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the ancillary provider ended care of the patient.
